Interface IDeliveryServiceProcessing

All Known Implementing Classes:
DeliveryService
public interface IDeliveryServiceProcessing

  • Method Summary

    This method will create a new Order and place it in the HashSet

    This method will delete an existing Base Product from the list

    This methos imports all the base products from the cvs file (products.cvs)

    This method will order a base product list ascending

    This method generates the report for the orders that have been placed in a time interval

    This method generates the report for the products that have been ordered more than a giving value

    This method will serialize the data form Delivery Service

  • Method Details

    • importProducts

      void importProducts() throws java.io.IOException
      This methos imports all the base products from the cvs file (products.cvs)
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - throws an IO exception

    • searchBaseProductsBasedOnRating

      java.util.HashSet<BaseProduct> searchBaseProductsBasedOnRating​(float minVal, float maxVal)
      This method will select products from the imported list based on column's Rating value
      Parameters:
      minVal - minimum Value
      maxVal - maximum Value
      Returns:
      the list with the products that have the rating in interval [minimum, maximum]
      needs
      ({"minVal >= 0" ,"maxVal >= 0"})

      needs

    • modifyProduct

      void modifyProduct​(java.lang.String name, float rating, int calories, int proteins, int fats, int sodium, int price, int productId)
      This method will modify an existing Base Product from the list
      Parameters:
      name - name
      rating - rating
      calories - calories
      proteins - proteins
      fats - fats
      sodium - sodium
      price - price
      productId - productId
      needs
      ({"name != null", "rating > 0", "calories >0", "proteins >0", "fats>0", "sodium >0", "price >0"})

    • createCompositeProduct

      CompositeProduct createCompositeProduct​(java.util.List<MenuItem> selectedProducts, java.lang.String productName, int productID)
      This method will create a new Composite Product with the given selected products
      Parameters:
      selectedProducts - selectedProducts list
      productName - the product name
      productID - the product id
      Returns:
      the new Composite Product that has been created
      needs
      ({"selectedProducts!=null"})

    • createOrder

      Order createOrder​(int clientID, java.util.HashSet<MenuItem> items)
      This method will create a new Order and place it in the HashSet
      Parameters:
      clientID - clientID
      items - items
      Returns:
      the order just created with the given data
      needs

    • reportBasedOnHourInterval

      void reportBasedOnHourInterval​(int start, int end) throws java.io.IOException
      This method generates the report for the orders that have been placed in a time interval
      Parameters:
      start - start hour
      end - end hour
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - throws IO exception
      needs
      ({"start < end"})
